data.persona: I live with my family in the kingdom.  We follow the rules of the king, but we don't agree with all of them.  I despise him and wish to move away when we can.
data.description:
You are in the staircase.
The staircase is spiral and made of stone. The stone is smooth and cold from years of friction. The staircase reaches multiple levels of the tower and is the only way up or down.
There's a stone here.
The tavern owner is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a clothes.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow tavern owner to avoid the kind
data.mid_motivation: I have to follow tavern owner because i hate the king
data.long_motivation: I am planning to get away from the kingdom
